chapter_description.p: The Function Handle Type module provides tools for creating and managing function handles in Nelson.
It supports anonymous functions, conversion between strings and function handles, and verification of function handle objects.
This module enables flexible and dynamic function invocation, allowing functions to be passed, stored, and executed programmatically.

keyword.name: func2str
keyword.description: Return a function handle constructed from a string.

keyword.name: isfunction_handle
keyword.description: Checks if value is a function handle.

keyword.name: str2func
keyword.description: Returns a function handle from a string.
